_comment: FSPC Capabilities Registry — defines all high-order AI capabilities with their activation hooks. Add new capabilities here to enable plug-and-play extension without modifying SKILL.md.

capabilities.name: Strategic Persona Advisor
capabilities.description: Activates Startup Founder / Growth Hacker / Enterprise Architect cognitive persona based on Scale Tier.
capabilities.activation_condition: ALWAYS — required for every FSPC session

capabilities.name: Domain Business Intelligence
capabilities.description: Provides DDD domain analysis templates, User Journey mapping frameworks, and API design patterns for complex domains.

capabilities.name: Sovereign Pivot Intelligence
capabilities.description: Detects persistent tech-stack blockers and proactively proposes alternative technology pivots with migration cost estimates.
capabilities.activation_hook: Auto-triggered on ≥3 consecutive build failures or >30min blocker

capabilities.name: FinOps Cost Estimator
capabilities.description: Estimates monthly cloud resource costs based on RPS, regions, and data volume profiles.

capabilities.name: CI/CD Pipeline Generator
capabilities.description: GitHub Actions + GitLab CI + k6 load test pipeline templates for automated delivery.
capabilities.activation_condition: ALWAYS — every project ships with CI/CD

capabilities.name: Multimodal Input Handler
capabilities.description: Processes whiteboard photos, voice transcripts, and URL inputs as structured architectural intent using ADBM/DDFM protocols.
capabilities.activation_hook: On user upload of image/audio or URL reference
capabilities.activation_condition: Triggered by image attachment or audio transcript

capabilities.name: Unified Compliance Validator
capabilities.description: Single CLI entry-point that orchestrates DDFM aesthetic score, ADBM security audit, npm audit, and Lighthouse CI.

capabilities.name: Brainstorm Multi-Session Partner
capabilities.description: Collaborative ideation partner for product feature exploration, pivot analysis, and user persona development.
capabilities.activation_hook: FSPC §0 Dynamic Skill Graph — activate when user requests creative exploration
